title: WHY AM I VSING A BUNCH OF BOTS
body:
IM SO MAD ATM CAUSE SHITTY FUCKING LIGHTSHOT wouldn't let me screenshot while in game so I had to make the game into window mode and etc and etc. I finally go a screenshot of their build and the actual people who were real.

Please Riot improve the system. The real people are the one who stayed back. Please just perma ban the bots.

http://i.imgur.com/aoo8d4m.png - in game with their builds (everyone with ghost except rumble started with boots of swiftness)
http://i.imgur.com/boFJuZu.png - end of game it was only 3 people who were real while 7 were fake.

replies.body:
Hey there, thanks for bringing this forward. I know it sucks to play with bots (really bad ones at that) when you queued up to have a pvp experience.

We do permaban bots as we find them, and are working on doing a better job at this to prevent them from impacting as many games as possible.
I did another game and this time 5 were real while 5 were fake. Kayle was with 4 bots sadly. I was with 1 which was a Draven.
